§ 3707. Regulations The Director of the Office of Personnel Management shall prescribe regulations for the administration of this chapter. (Added Pub. L. 107–347, title II, § 209(c)(1), Dec. 17, 2002, 116 Stat. 2930.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective 120 days after Dec. 17, 2002, see section 402(a) of Pub. L. 107–347, set out as a note under section 3601 of Title 44, Public Printing and Documents.
